title: Category description
description: A category/kind/genre of KüAs, with name, icon, and a display color, e.g. music, sports, games, talk

id.description: The unique identifier of the category

icon.description: An icon (emoji) or abbreviation of the category

color.description: Hexadecimal color code to use as display color for KüAs of this category

sort_key.description: Key for sorting the categories in the UI. The category with lowest sort_key is shown first and is the default category for new entries.
